title: Beautiful Waltham 1 Bedroom
posting_body: For the most up to date information, visit: <URL>
<URL>
Rent Directly From RCG and Pay No Fee!
This is for an apartment rental.
RCG does not rent by the room.
VIRTUAL TOUR: https://kuula.co/share/collection/7vM32?logo=0&info=0&fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&initload=0&thumbs=1
Available for 9/1 Lease start date or sooner.
Very large, 2nd-floor 1 bedroom w/bonus storage space on 3rd floor.
Apartment features newly installed vinyl flooring throughout.
Other improvements include fresh paint, upgraded LED lighting, and new kitchen cabinets and countertops.
Owner will be making additional cosmetic improvements in the bathroom in the coming week, including updated plumbing fixtures and accessories.
Coin-op laundry in adjacent RCG managed building.
Off-street parking may be available for rent.
Tenant pays all utilities.
No dogs.
Conveniently located minutes from Moody St & Waltham Center!
Easy access to shops, restaurants, commuter rail to Boston, buses, Mass Pike, Route 128, and I-95.
*Owner will be adding a door off the kitchen and building an exterior rear egress deck & stair during the lease term.
